com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

Class Trigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.JsonSerializable
      • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.Resource
        • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.Trigger

  • public class Trigger
extends Resource
    Represents a trigger.

    DocumentDB supports pre and post triggers defined in JavaScript to be executed on creates, updates and deletes. For additional details, refer to the server-side JavaScript API documentation.
